p: The indoor temperature and relative humidity for each one of the 1040 parishes were extracted for the simulation results. Using the control thresholds of 20Â°C for temperature and 35% for relative humidity [ 57], the simulated data allow to discriminate between parishes with exposure to adequate conditions for influenza transmission from parishes with less exposure. The map in Figure 4 presents the disease rates, and no spatial pattern can be clearly identified at this stage.
